16g PROTEIN
Nut-Free

NUT-FREE SUNBUTTER PROTEIN BARS

A safe and delicious protein bar for those with nut allergies, made with sunflower seed butter and providing 16g of protein.

16g
Protein
230
Calories
10m
Total Time
12
Yield

Nutrition per 1 bar

Carbs22g
Fat13g
Fiber5g
Sugar9g
DifficultyEasy

INGREDIENTS

  • 240g sunflower seed butter
  • 120g honey
  • 120g vanilla whey protein powder
  • 90g rolled oats
  • 60g sunflower seeds

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Prepare the pan

Line an 8x8 inch pan with parchment paper.

2

Mix wet ingredients

In a large bowl, mix together the sunflower seed butter and honey.

3

Add dry ingredients

Add the protein powder and rolled oats, and mix until a dough forms.

4

Press into pan

Press the dough evenly into the prepared pan.

5

Top with seeds

Sprinkle the sunflower seeds on top and press them in gently.

6

Chill and cut

Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before cutting into 12 bars.

PRO TIPS

üí°

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

üí°

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

üí°

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
